entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration has vulnerable dependencies, no upgrade available #59223
  • Minor issues with RequestLocalizationMiddleware #59218
  • After running the project with https and logging in to the account, stop and run the project again with http, unable to log into account in Safari browser on Mac OS. #59216

Closed

  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59225
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59224
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions 9.0 needs additional TFM net8.0 #59095
  • Perf regression: updates #59215
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59222
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59221
  • .NET 9 Upgrade then Migration Problem ! #59217
  • [Blazor] <details> @ontoggle should support 2-way binding #59200
  • nuget package 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client' is not compatible with Blazor server webassembly using .NET 8.0 #59085
  • Blazor Web App Template Global Interactivity location causes Not Found issue when navigate to the page/component in Server project. #58944
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59086

PullRequests

Merged

  • fix: target current LTS framework for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions` #59219
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    community-contribution, area-networking
